mapper.insert: insert into organization(org_groupname, org_teamname, org_teamtel, org_content) values(#{org_groupname},#{org_teamname},#{org_teamtel}, #{org_content});
mapper.update: update organization set org_groupname = #{org_groupname}, org_teamname = #{org_teamname}, org_teamtel = #{org_teamtel}, org_content = #{org_content} where emp_teamcode = #{org_teamcode}
